subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Sabres re-signed defenseman Teppo Numminen after he missed all but one game last season after heart surgery. Sabres General Manager Darcy Regier said Numminen, 40, an unrestricted free agent, agreed to a one-year contract worth $1.1 million.
